articles.author: Jordan D. Metzl
articles.title: Column | Want to lose weight? Here’s why exercise probably won’t help. - The Washington Post
articles.description: The benefits of exercise are numerous, but losing weight isn’t one of them. Here are some better motivations to add regular exercise to your routine.
articles.content:
I exercise most days, but the number on the scale never moves. Whats even the point?
Exercise is not very effective for weight loss, but its incredibly beneficial for your physical and mental health.
